text:
A Dialogue From ‘Thackeray’ Is The Latest Entrant In The Meme Club & Here Are Some Masterpieces
A Dialogue From ‘Thackeray’ Is The Latest Entrant In The Meme Club & Here Are Some Masterpieces
Yesterday, the trailer of much-awaited biopic Thackeray, which is based on the life of Shiv Sena founder Bal Thackeray had released, and since then social media has been buzzing with posts around it.
Nawazuddin Siddiqui’s uncannily similar look to the Shiv Sena chief and an impeccable goose-bumps inducing performance has struck a chord with the audiences.
Soon after the release of the trailer, CBFC raised objections to four dialogues and two scenes in the movie, and asked the makers to make necessary changes. Furthermore, actor Siddharth also called out the movie trailer for being “anti-South Indian”.
Read More: ‘Thackeray’ Lands In Another Controversy, Actor Siddharth Calls The Trailer ‘Anti-South Indian’
Keeping everything aside, the creative minds on social media turned this dialogue of the movie, into memes, and they’re hilarious. So, here's your daily dose of laughter!

#2
When you plan to mass bunk for the first time. #Thackeray pic.twitter.com/vQ0CkKHDtW — Bollywood Gandu (@BollywoodGandu) December 26, 2018
Don't Miss 365 SHARES 7.5 K SHARES
